website_summaries.verdict: This kettle is quick heating and packed with features, although some found it to be not as durable as other models.
pros: 1,000W power, and can hold up to 1.8 liters
LED light comes on when the water reaches boiling
Auto-shutoff, as well as a no-water shutoff
cons: Some reports of rusting, leaks, and the kettle stopped working completely after a few months of use
Some say that this kettle develops a plastic-like taste over time

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worked great in the beginning now leaking from bottom of handle after 4 months of use. Update: I received a replacement from the company. Great service and communications from them. The new kettle I received works great without any problem and I actually love it. My kids love the blue light! Heats up water much quicker. I use it everyday more than once a day. Holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Heats up fast.
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this tea kettle. The first one a got had a manufactured defect in the lid, and the seller sent me a new one immediately. Amazing customer service. I love the glass, and how it lights up. The tea filter in the middle is awesome. You can add the tea leave to the pot during the boil or after, depending on how bitter or strong you like your tea. I finally started using that loose tea I've had for so long.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: This kettle leaks out the bottom!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this kettle several months ago. Within a week, it leaked out of the bottom, which is definitely not something you want happening with something that you plug in. We returned the kettle and ordered a replacement. This replacement lasted about a month and a half before it also began to leak out the bottom. We are very upset that we have twice been sold a faulty product.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick E. Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Leaks and overflows
customer_reviews.text: the one I got could have been defective...it leaks where the top of the glass meets the metal portion, right below the spout. Also if you fill your water to the 1.8ltr (max) and it boils, it will overflow and settle in the charging pad....it is easy to use, but not easy to clean, I had what appeared to be rust in the bottom interior of the kettle if I kept my tea in for more than 4 hours...not worth the investment....
